internalComponents.name: Account Manager
internalComponents.description: Responsible for the lifecycle of bank accounts. It handles creation, status updates (closing/freezing), and retrieving account details. It interacts heavily with the database to maintain balance consistency.

internalComponents.name: Transaction Processor
internalComponents.description: Manages the execution of financial transactions such as deposits, withdrawals, and transfers. It ensures that funds are available before processing and maintains an audit trail of all movements.

internalComponents.name: Loan Manager
internalComponents.description: Handles the lending business capability. It processes loan applications, manages the approval workflow, calculates monthly payments, and tracks the remaining balance and interest.

internalComponents.name: Customer Manager
internalComponents.description: Manages customer identity and profiles. It handles onboarding, KYC verification status, and updates to personal contact information.

internalComponents.name: Branch Manager
internalComponents.description: Manages the physical branch locations and the employees assigned to them. It provides data regarding where accounts are held and where staff are located.

internalComponents.name: Interest Calculator
internalComponents.description: A batch-oriented component responsible for calculating compound interest for savings and money market accounts. It runs periodically to credit interest to eligible accounts.

internalComponents.name: Statement Generator
internalComponents.description: A batch component that generates monthly account statements for customers. It aggregates transaction history for a specific period into a report format.

internalComponents.name: Card Manager
internalComponents.description: Manages the lifecycle of debit and credit cards linked to accounts. It handles card issuance, status tracking, and transaction authorization.

internalComponents.name: Bill Pay Service
internalComponents.description: Manages scheduled and recurring payments to external payees. It tracks payment schedules and executes transfers from customer accounts.

internalComponents.name: Audit Logger
internalComponents.description: Captures and records changes to critical data entities. It ensures compliance and security by logging who changed what and when.

externalDependencies.name: Oracle Database
externalDependencies.description: The primary persistence store and execution engine for business logic (via PL/SQL). All internal components depend on this for state and processing.

externalDependencies.name: Local File System
externalDependencies.description: Used by the Statement Generator to output generated monthly statement files.
